name: Partisan Calculator
description: Reads your history, and shows the top ten pages you go to by typing the URL.
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' https://d3js.org/ https://ajax.googleapis.com https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/ https://code.jquery.com/ https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com https://stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com; object-src 'self'
